name: erotica-lifestyle-website
description: A modern, responsive adult wellness e-commerce website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features contemporary design patterns, smooth animations, and professional user experience.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate-sitemap && npm run validate && npm run optimize
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run generate-sitemap && npm run validate && npm run optimize:production
scripts.build:staging: npm run clean && npm run generate-sitemap && npm run validate
scripts.build:preview: npm run clean && npm run generate-sitemap
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning build artifacts...' && rm -rf dist && echo 'Clean completed'
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:css && npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:images
scripts.optimize:production: npm run optimize:css:prod && npm run optimize:js:prod && npm run optimize:images:prod
scripts.optimize:css:prod: npx cleancss -o dist/css/styles.min.css css/main.css css/components/*.css css/utils/*.css
scripts.validate: npm run validate:html && npm run validate:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.validate:html: npx html-validate '*.html' 'wellness-quiz.html' || echo 'HTML validation completed with warnings'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:js: npx eslint js/**/*.js --fix || echo 'JavaScript linting completed'
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run lint && echo 'All tests passed!'
scripts.deploy: npm run build:production && echo 'Ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build:staging && echo 'Preview build ready'
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build:production && echo 'GitHub Pages deployment ready'
scripts.deploy:netlify: npm run build:production && echo 'Netlify deployment ready'
scripts.deploy:vercel: npm run build:production && echo 'Vercel deployment ready'
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:bundle && npm run analyze:performance
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run validate
scripts.watch: echo 'File watching not implemented - use live server'
scripts.doctor: npm run validate && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run audit

author: Erotica Lifestyle Team
